member.name: IRpcProxyBuffer.Connect
member.summary: Initializes a client proxy, binding it to the specified RPC channel.
member.param: A pointer to the interface that the proxy uses to marshal data.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

member.name: IRpcProxyBuffer.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects a client proxy from any RPC channel to which it is connected.

member.name: IRpcProxyBuffer
member.summary: Controls the RPC proxy used to marshal data between COM components.
